translation: That which is night to all beings, in that the self-controlled man is awake; when all beings are awake, that is night for the sage who sees.
commentary: 2.69 or which? Night night? of all beings? in that in that? Awakening wakes? temperate the selfcontrolled? in which in which? Awakening wake? Bhootani all beings? She that? Night night? seeing (of the) seeing? Muneá¸¥ of the Muni.Commentary That which is real for the wordlyminded people is illusion for the sage? and vice versa. The sage lives in the Self.
